properties.description: This initiative includes audit and virtual machine extension policies that address a subset of NIST SP 800-171 R2 requirements. Additional policies will be added in upcoming releases. For more information, visit https://aka.ms/nist800171r2-blueprint.

metadata.displayName: Include Arc connected servers for Guest Configuration policies
metadata.description: Optionally choose to audit settings inside Arc connected servers using Guest Configuration policies. By selecting this option, you agree to be charged monthly per Arc connected machine.

metadata.displayName: List of users excluded from Windows VM Administrators group
metadata.description: A semicolon-separated list of users that should be excluded in the Administrators local group; Ex: Administrator; myUser1; myUser2

metadata.displayName: List of users that must be included in Windows VM Administrators group
metadata.description: A semicolon-separated list of users that should be included in the Administrators local group; Ex: Administrator; myUser1; myUser2

metadata.displayName: List of regions where Network Watcher should be enabled
metadata.description: Audit if Network Watcher is not enabled for region(s).
Name of the resource group of NetworkWatcher, such as NetworkWatcherRG

metadata.displayName: Log Analytics workspace ID for VM agent reporting
metadata.description: ID (GUID) of the Log Analytics workspace where VMs agents should report.
Latest supported PHP version for App Services

metadata.displayName: Optional: List of Windows VM images that support Log Analytics agent to add to audit scope
metadata.description: A semicolon-separated list of images; Ex: /subscriptions/<subscriptionId>/resourceGroups/YourResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/images/ContosoStdImage

metadata.displayName: Optional: List of Linux VM images that support Log Analytics agent to add to audit scope
